messages.title: Working hard for Hackney South and Shoreditch
messages.content: Dear Friend, At this election the future of our country is at stake. Labour is fighting to save our NHS. Under Labour you'll get an urgent GP appointment within 48 hours. Labour will build more affordable housing and secure a fairer deal for private renters. Labour is promising 25 hours of free childcare for 3 and 4 year olds - something many parents tell me they need to make ends meet while they go out to work. I’ve fought for Hackney for 10 years as your MP. At this election we face the choice between continued Tory hardship or Labour. Only Labour will deliver a fairer future for Britain.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: 20,000 more nurses, 8,000 more GPs, a GP appointment within 48hrs, and a focus on mental health.
Scrap the hated Bedroom Tax, build more affordable homes, secure longer-term private tenancies and ban rip-off letting fees.
25 hours free childcare for 3 and 4 year olds and guaranteed 8am to 6pm school opening for primary pupils.
Balance the books and invest in infrastructure. Create a level playing field for British companies and a fair deal for taxpayers by tackling tax avoidance.
A guaranteed job for young people after a year out of work. Longer and better paternity leave for fathers.

issues.economy: Balance the books and invest in infrastructure. Create a level playing field for British companies and a fair deal for taxpayers by tackling tax avoidance.
issues.health: 20,000 more nurses, 8,000 more GPs, a GP appointment within 48hrs, and a focus on mental health.

housing.content: Scrap the hated Bedroom Tax, build more affordable homes, secure longer-term private tenancies and ban rip-off letting fees.

leaflet.personalStatement: I’ve fought for Hackney for 10 years as your MP.

images.caption: Meg Hillier with a backdrop of a hospital sign, marking her focus on healthcare.
